articles.content: In addition to the drone attack, Russian forces shelled residential buildings in the city of Kherson, injuring two people, and carried out 10 aerial strikes on communities in the front-line region of… [+470 chars]

And while allies have experience navigating the disruptions and uncertainties of the U.S. president, this administration is a more expansionist and aggressive one than theyve faced before.
